about.details:
Incorporated in 2013, Maharashtra- based Transpact Enterprises Limited is a biotechnology startUp. It provides comprehensive & cost-effective products and solutions to specially-abled people. The company is continuously working towards technological innovations and interventions to improve their products. Transpact Enterprises mainly designs, develops and distributes Vestibulator, a therapeutic device. The device has been invented by the Society for Innovation and Entrepreneurship, lIT Bombay. And, Transpact Enterprises holds a license to carry out the commercial activities of Vestibulator. It is a co-patented technology of the company and IRCC-IIT Bombay. Vestibulator: It is a therapeutic device to offer optimum vestibular stimulation for the cases with vestibular dysfunctions. The company outsources the manufacturing of the device along with the design details to a 3rd party. With the help of advanced software, the company offers customized device solutions for patients.

Competitive Strengths

1. User Friendly device with unique features 2. Technical foundation to offer customized device 3. Quality assured and certified device

faqs.question: What is the Transpact IPO?
faqs.answer:
Transpact IPO is a SME IPO of 104000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹1.35 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹130 per share. The minimum order quantity is 1000.

The IPO opens on August 26, 2019, and closes on August 28, 2019.

Bigshare Services Pvt Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on BSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Transpact IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Transpact IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Transpact IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Transpact IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Transpact IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Transpact IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Transpact IPO opens on August 26, 2019 and closes on August 28, 2019.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Transpact IPO?
faqs.answer: Transpact IPO lot size is 1000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,30,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Transpact IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Transpact IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Transpact IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Transpact IPO will be done on Tuesday, September 3, 2019, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Thursday, September 5, 2019. Check the Transpact IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Transpact IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Transpact IPO listing date is on Thursday, September 5, 2019.
